## About Me
---
I am a grad student at the University of Michigan, Ann Arbor, in the [QFRM](http://lsa.umich.edu/math/graduates/quantitative-finance.html) program.  
  
[Current Resume](https://github.com/tomkoos/docs/resume.pdf) (update:Aug 26,16)
